inn1.comm: widish and short to start off, moving away and left alone
phew, that came in a long way, and bounced sharply too, Rohit did well to avoid it, dropping wrists
quick, sharp and back of a length outside off, Rohit pulls bat out of the way
direct hit at the striker's but Dhawan has made it after Rohit nudged a shortish one angled in, to square leg
nice, first ball to the left-hander, who is beaten as it jags across him from good length with some angle and some movement
and again, spot on with the line, Dhawan holds the bat slightly inside the line this time
starts with a wide angle across the right-hander, left alone
takes a big step out and lets it go on the angle once more

an edge, but Rohit has played this very softly, holding bat close to the body, that is why it falls far short of the cordon, they run for the single, and a direct hit would have had Dhawan out by at least a couple of feet
he presses forward to a good length ball outside off and pushes it with an angled bat, but point dives to deny him
there is only midwicket, no mid on, and Dhawan eases into a soft push through that vacant space, closing the face of the bat late
Rohit comes forward in that, lazy, languid, elegant, call it what you want, fashion, and is hit on the pad, but there seemed to be an inside edge as well
Morkel has settled into a tight line early, arrives short of a good length around off, and is pushed to covers
a lifter outside off now, got up very high, and Dhawan watched it go
good length, and he lets it go on the angle this time
one more leave as Morkel pushes it across on a good length
reverts to back of a length, tight line again, and Dhawan gets on his toes to push to covers
this is pitched up, but on the pads, and even though Dhawan is a touch late to pick it, he is able to work it through square leg quite crisply
length ball sent down the leg side, a question more than an appeal for caught behind turned down
neat, comes forward and across to push this good length ball solidly to cover
just back of a length, Rohit drops it onto the pitch and trots out, but there is no run there, bowler is around to send him back
wanted to punch through covers but the line was too close for him to get any timing on it
sprays it way down the leg side now, some inward movement too, not of any help
another shout for leg before from Tsotsobe, that looked close, seemed to pitch in line, could have been the height, well, well, what do i know, replays show that pitching clearly outside leg
and then he spots the line very early, it is just outside off, the front foot comes out confidently, and the connection, even if just a push, is too much for mid off, who chases it
tries to drive now, front foot coming out neatly again, but cannot time it, cover fields
opens the face to run a back of a length ball to point
goes for the hook, hasn't timed it, and it hasn't carried by a long way to fine leg
accurate bouncer, Rohit ducks early
shortish, and angled into the pad now, rolls away to fine leg
pushed to mid off
fine leave, that was close to off stump and straightening into him a tad
hello, Rohit's decided to have a go, this is quite wide and he's smashed it over the infield, and it's carried all the way over the deep cover rope
shortens the length, tightens the line, Rohit tries to turn it to third man, can't time it, and slip cuts it off
lunges forward outside off to defend, it pops up low in the air for a short while
makes room now, and gets the single to third man from middle and leg
right on off stump from a good length, pushed back to mid off
Dhawan gets going now, skips down the track and places it through extra cover
he's missed this one angled in, and is struck on the box, he's in some pain briefly
left alone outside off
nice, this shortish ball got big on Rohit, around chest height, coming in with the angle, he had time to move across, swivel and pull it into the ground, to the deep square leg rope
a lot more effort on this bouncer, and Rohit avoids it, just about
good length, he comes forward flowingly and pushes to cover
this is a good examination, and Rohit is doing alright so far, short of a length ball bounces and straightens, he half fends half defends with soft hands to gully
back of a length on leg, worked behind square
Rohit is not doing badly at all, another short one, not much bite, and he pulls it high over square leg off the front foot
plays out a short of a length ball to point
that teases McLaren all the way to the deep extra cover rope, overpitched this time and he eases it into the gap, all that elegance producing some runs for a change
pitched up, Rohit has bat in front of pad on the forward push to send it to mid off
beaten now, short, wide, and moving away, Rohit tries the cut
uh oh, length down the leg side to start off, Dhawan flicks it miles wide of the man at short fine
same line, but this time Dhawan cannot get bat on it
widish, and he's sliced it in the air down to third man
angled across, back of a length, left alone
wider with the angle, left alone, and called a wide
skips out to work a length ball off the pads to deep square
he was looking for a big shot, shuffled across, but saw the length ball angled in to off, and blocked it
not much bowling friendly at the moment, this comes on nicely from back of a length and runs faster off Dhawan's angled bat to point
pitched up and driven hard, cover gets a hand to it, but it still needs a long chase to be stopped
Rohit comes the track and has a heave, misses
moves across and tucks a length ball off middle to square leg, bowler's overstepped, says umpire, that was no small no-ball
charges out but hits the full delivery straight back to the bowler
punched off the back foot to extra cover
short, he swivels and pulls without issue to deep square
another short ball and another pull, Rohit finding the deep backward square boundary this time
tries to run it to third man, cannot time it wide of slip
pushes a pitched up delivery to extra cover
pitched up, left alone outside off stump
punched away to sweeper cover
back of a length, pushed down the track
width on the length ball and he reaches out to drive to sweeper cover
short yet again, and Dhawan uses the angle to pull off his pads behind square leg
short once more, this time Dhawan misses the pull and the ball rolls onto the pitch
runs it to third man for a single
eases a tossed up full ball to long off
full again, pushed down to long on
flighted slower, he comes out and whips it square, they push for the second and get it
defended off the front foot
straightens on off stump, bat far in front of pad to block
flighted, he reaches out and pushes, an inside edge runs to square leg
short of a length, he pushes, a thick inside edge into pad and rolls onto the leg side
that was a chance, the zillionth short ball, Dhawan hooks, times it alright, no danger of this falling short, but Morkel is too far in at fine leg, and this flies over him
better, gets it to straighten a bit on off and beats the push
gets forward, opens the face and runs it behind point
length ball punched from the crease to a diving cover
almost as if he waiting for this rather lifeless short ball, Rohit cranks up and bursts into a powerful pull that races to the deep midwicket rope
Dhawan steps out first ball of the over, takes it on the full, beats extra cover's dive and there is too much for the sweeper to do
he's coming out again, and putting it away past mid off's dive now, had to reach out to get to the pitch, and did
a full toss on leg stump, Dhawan sweeps in the air, Duminy does well to stop another boundary with a dive at deep square
a soft push off the front foot with an open face behind point
tries to distract the bowler with some early leg work but Peterson is right on the stumps, pushed for a single
knocked down to long on
too much width, and Rohit cuts, with elegance, of course, third man gets around
closer to the body from just short of a length, steered to third man
walks out, is cramped, picks up one with an open face through covers
good length, runs it straight to backward point now
big forward stride and a push, but point's dive prevents any run
manages to beat point's dive this time and takes the single to third man, India go to drinks, their makeshift opening combination working wonders
full, knocked back to the bowler
nudged with the slight turn, Rohit wants one, he's not getting it, short midwicket's around
fifty for Rohit Sharma with a push to long on, he's been made to open, and he's done the job
cut away, but cannot beat backward point
comes out and slams a tossed up ball to long off
goes back and ends up pushing it in the air, safely wide of the bowler and down to long on
allows a short of a length ball to come on and guides it to point
far too wide and slashed, couple of bounces, to third man

that surprised him, that was nasty, short ball reared up and hit Dhawan on the side of the helmet, even as he stood stunned and motionless, Rohit ran up, his arms spread wide, imploring his partner to run as the ball rolled behind square, finally Dhawan gathered his wits and jogged to the other end
worked off the pad through square leg
tries to forcefully whip this length ball away, on the bounce to midwicket
shortish, didn't get up much, Dhawan places the pull wide of deep midwicket
guides it to point, who cannot stop it, single taken
Rohit pulls, from outside off, and picks up four more to the deep midwicket boundary, say all you want about Indian batsmen struggling against the short ball, but don't include this man in that list
played out to point
Some width and he flashes a cut to a diving point

Dhawan reaches fifty with a push in front of cover, they take on the throw, which misses, what a start to the Champions Trophy for India, who would have though, makeshift opening combination, specialist untested opener, and they have put on a century stand
Rohit winds up and forces this length ball past extra cover's dive and mid off's too
eases this good length ball with an open face to the sweeper
thick inside edge onto pad flap as Rohit pushes at this short of a length ball
steered to third man
tries an imperious stand-and-dispatch through extra cover, but hits it to the man
bounce, lots of it, and Dhawan ends up punching under the line
sharp short ball, but Dhawan has crouched and controlled the pull well to deep square
straight and skiddy outside off, Rohit leaves with complete control
holds the line and beats the push from the crease, but it is a no-ball, wow, nothing going for South Africa
makes room and wants to heave it to leg but Morkel follows him and Rohit is too cramped up to connect
driven to deep cover, a long way in from the rope
Rohit's pulled this straight to deep square leg, who is again several yards in, it was not that short, under the waist, he's just picked it up into the fielder's hands
what a welcome, Virat Kohli, hi there, take this bouncer, it cuts in sharply, Kohli's dropped his wrists but his helmet grille is right in the way of the ball, smack
thumps a pull across the turf, but deep midwicket is around
swept off the pads in the air over short fine, deep square prevents the boundary with a sprawling dive
down the track to push for one to long on
goes back and across to work off the pad through midwicket
skips out early and drives a tossed up ball down the ground, long on runs around
dabbed to short third man
defended off the front foot
gets on top of a short of a length ball and makes room to cut it in the air to third man
length ball, angled across, harmless, defended
moves forward and drives out to sweeper cover
that is smartly played, Dhawan was cramped with a shortish ball on off stump, but he arched back quickly and lapped it over the keeper
some width but Dhawan has cracked this straight to point
Tsotsobe is being taken apart, Dhawan dances out and hammers a length ball high and straight
short, and down the leg side, he gets away with a single to fine leg as Dhawan is not able to time the pull
calmly dabs it to third man
and again Dhawan gets away with the deep fielder standing a long way in, pulls in the air and over deep square leg, who tries getting back, but in vain
pushes to gully, who cuts off the single with a dive
too wide, bowler escaped as sweeper cover got around to a powerful cut, but a fumble allowed two
worked off the pad in front of square leg, and they are too quick to be denied the second as the man from the deep runs in
knocks a length ball softly in front of mid off, and they zip across for one more
short on off, and Dhawan pulls again, this time he has no reason to worry about the deep fielder, it flies in the gap to vacant deep midwicket
some sharp turn for Duminy, Kohli goes back and has to adjust his cut to a dab to short third
tossed up around off, driven to short extra
cut away to sweeper cover
wide, cut in the air and down to deep point
down the track to push to long off
length ball pushed back to the bowler
drives a pitched up ball straight to short extra
moves across to whip off the pad but he hasn't timed it, to short fine
right forward to push a length ball to point
bouncer gets high outside off, but Kohli pulls, drags it high over midwicket for two more
stays in the crease to steer a widish length ball to third man
Comes down the pitch but bowler follows him with a shortish ball, and Dhawan can't do anything with it, fends it away
Beaten on the cut as this stays low outside iff
Dipping full toss hit back to the bowler
Moves across to turn it to square leg
swat-driven for a single through extra cover
dabbed softly down to third man
pace continues to leak runs for South Africa, full on the pads and Dhawan flicks this to the deep backward square leg boundary
gets away with a wide ball outside off as Dhawan misses the cut,
chops this length ball to backward point, throw misses, Kohli would have just about made it had it hit
worked to midwicket and he is not getting the single
short and wide, he underedges the cut on the bounce to the keeper
bowler saves the single with a dive to his right
pushes it wider of the bowler and takes one down to long off
pulled straight to short midwicket
swat-driven into the hands of extra cover
turned past midwicket, Amla runs in from the  boundary to keep them to one
cut wide of the sweeper cover for two more
turned behind square leg
opens the face to run it in the air to third man
drives a length ball to the sweeper
he's charged out and got cramped for room again, tries to heave it away but cannot
why charge out and heave when you can do this, Dhawan flashes a silken cut past backward point next ball
short ball, waist height, Dhawan swats it without fuss to the deep square leg boundary, takes his helmet off and raises his arms, what a year he's having
AB's messed up a simple stumping, Dhawan skips out, looks to defend, is beaten, he is way out of the crease, AB has a lot of time, he takes the bails off, but has failed to collect the ball first
moves down the pitch and eases it to long on
starts with a wide ball and Kohli reaches out to flash a drive to the deep extra cover rope
intentional this, opens the face very late to a short of a length ball and runs it past the keeper
steers a length ball to third man
stays in the crease and runs this length ball on off to point
drives through the line with no worries at all to the sweeper
India lose a wicket before the powerplay, the shot was on, and Kohli pulled the short ball, but he didn't time it and picked out Amla at the edge of the deep midwicket rope
can't time the cut, off the toe end to point, whose throw misses and they get one more
Skips out and drives now, but extra cover dives and stops it
very short outside off, Dhawan ramps it high, suddenly they are mistiming everything, this falls well short of the boundary, and third man gets to it
cuts this from close to off stump to the sweeper
bit of a leading edge as he pushes this down the pitch
opens the face, runs it to point, and wants the single, is sent back
tries the reverse sw
quicker and fuller, pushed to the bowler
drags the pull to wide mid on, for a single
lifts this pitched up delivery high over midwicket, fielder runs around to it eventually as it slows down
dabs this to gully who prevents the single
pulls this violently out to deep square
places this push wide of extra cover and the sweeper
DK down the track, and lifts this way over the long on boundary
runs this to short third for a single
gone, Dhawan's swept this off the pad to square leg, it is a high take but the substitute Phangiso has timed his hop alright
knocked back to the bowler in awkward effective Dhoni fashion
left alone outside off
Dhoni takes off early, pitched up outside off and he slaughters it over deep midwicket
that surprised him, bounced extra from a length, popped up on the off side off the glove
flicked to the left of Amla at deep midwicket and they take the second
bends the knee and gets out of the way of a short ball on the stumps
is hurried into the pull, but gets four nevertheless as it runs behi
length ball hit out to the sweeper
suddenly India are four down with more than ten overs to go, DK tried to dab a bouncer over the keeper, it was the slower one, cut in to the batsman, AB jumped to take the ball safely in one glove
short it is to Raina first ball, but a harmless one around waist height, and Raina drags it in front of square
driven to extra cover
short and quite wide down leg, Dhoni lets it go
punched to the sweeper
Raina gets the heave going early, picks this off the front foot and it has enough power to clear deep midwicket boundary
pulled hard but straight to deep midwicket
length into the left-hander from round the stumps, softly turned square, and they hare back for two, throw was off target
full on the stumps, Dhoni was setting himself up but pushed it back in the end
Dhoni's cracked this length delivery straight to long on, South Africa strike again
full on the stumps again, pushed to the bowler
shot, overpitched on off and Jadeja's crunched a drive past extra cover
overpitched once more, hits it in the air to cover
short and slow, nudged behind square
length ball steered to third man
whips a short of a length ball through midwicket
makes room and thrashes this out to the sweeper
width and Jadeja's flashed it over point
bouncer, angled in, Jadeja's can't do anything with it
neat, just outside off stump and he's steered it past short third man
goes across outside off and dabs it to third man to get Jadeja on strike
here comes Warnie's rockstar, charges out and and hammers it high and straight over the boundary, 83 metres that went
high full toss hit down to long off
Ashwin's shuffled across a mile and got some bat on this wide one on leg stump, past the keeper
very full just outside off, Ashwin backing away outside leg and missing it
takes it on the full and mishits to the bowler, who misses at the non-striker's end
short and wide, Ashwin can't do anything with it as he's beaten on the upper cut
and here's presenting, the yorker, making a rare appearance, Ashwin digs it towards third man
around the blockhole once more, Jadeja is disappointed he can only squeeze it to point

Ashwin sacrifices, gets an inside edge onto pad and to the bowler, Jadeja has run half way up the pitch by then, Ashwin realises there is going to be a run out, and crosses over to make sure he;s the one walking back
Jadeja makes sure Ashwin's sacrifice is not in vain, picks this length ball on off and middle and carts it over extra cover
Jadeja finishes on a high, short ball into the body, but he arches back and dabs it over the keeper, it almost goes over the boundary, one bounce in the end

inn2.comm: swinging in a tad to the right-hander, played out to midwicket
pitched further up and swung in to take an inside edge on the attempted drive, to fine leg
slight inswing again, Amla shuffles across and lets it go this time
that is through him, more inswing this time, and it sneaks in past the inside edge as Amla tries to drive
this is full into the pads and Amla's picked it over midwicket
length ball pushed softly and it runs behind the stumps
some shape into the left-hander turned in front of square
full outswinger, Amla cannot connect as he reaches for it
back of a length, angled in, gingerly turned wide of mid on
full into the pads to the left-hander and he's picked it through midwicket, mid on chases in vain
too quick, very full outside off and through to the keeper even as Igram's bat comes down
some width on a length and he flashes it past point to third man
Raina takes the thick edge at second slip, Bhuvneshwar's struck with the new ball, angled across on a good length, Ingram tries to punch from the crease and Raina snaps it up low
good length and tight line just outside off, defended
swinging across but starting outside leg, and turned through square leg for three
comes across and watchfully plays out a length ball to point
overpitched, driven to mid on, Ishant misses with the throw, Amla's bat hit Bhuvneshwar's leg, direct hit would have been interesting
wide awayswinger, and Amla lofts it over cover, clears the man safely
shortish now and Amla pulls past midwicket, hasn't timed it too well
Umesh leaking runs, full on the pads now, and Amla dispatches it past midwicket with a flick
and again, overpitches on the pads, and Amla takes him for four more to fine leg
Amla walks, Yadav gets one right, good length outside off stump, Amla pushes outside the line, and Dhoni takes the inside edge, this time it helped Yadav that it didn't swing
on the back foot and across to defend a length ball
shot, Peterson gets forward and dismisses a pitched up ball between cover and mid off
length on off now, pushed back
outside edge, but that has eluded second slip and also beaten Yadav's sprawling dive at third man
length ball flashed away, Kohli dives at cover but they have enough time to take the single
opens the face to run a length ball to third man
squeezes a full delivery past backward point's dive
punches a length ball to mid off
drags the pull awkwardly, but gets it past the dive at mid on for four
pitched up on middle, blocked
low and wide full toss mishit to extra cover
can't get hold of the pull, square leg fields and has a go at the non-striker's end, misses
he's ducked into the bouncer, came up too quickly into him, and he's copped it on the end of the bat handle and the right glove
runs this good length ball to point
pushes a length ball to cover where Kohli dives
turns a length ball off the pad to midwicket
lovely, AB moves forward and in a flash, drives to the deep cover boundary
knocked down to gully, who prevents the single
steered on the bounce to gully
and first ball, a widish length delivery, he's been lifted over extra cover
gets the line just around off and shortens the length, Peterson is beaten on the prod
pitched up, he mishits the drive to mid on
hit on the pads with a sharp length ball that came in, going down leg, and high too, and ... it pitched outside leg
nice, he didn't get much of a bowl, but he's caressed this length ball past extra cover, Dhawan's chased and scooped it back to save one
Ishant gives width, and AB helps himself to a cut through cover
thick edge down to third man off a length ball outside off
super, down the pitch, and little more than a push, which is wide of mid off
comes out again, this time defends the length ball
there was width, but he's mistimed the cut to point
pushes and gets across in time for a sharp single, lob misses from mid on
good length ball punched straight to cover
calmly defends a length ball outside off
shot, he's charged out and hit this length ball so hard, Raina at short extra cover's had to take evasive action
walks way outside off and then lets it go
straight length ball left alone again
he's playing some lovely strokes, stays on the crease and punches a length ball off the back foot through covers
allows a back of a length delivery to go past outside off
whips off the pad in front of square leg
pushes a length ball out to the sweeper
AB's pinging the off side boundary at will, another drive, through point this time, no stopping any of them
for once, he finds the fielder with a well-timed drive
wide length ball thumped to sweeper cover
run out chance fluffed, Peterson was way outside his crease, he'd run up a long way after AB pushed in front of mid on, but the throw was off target
very wide delivery cut through point, DK dives and saves the boundary
dabbed to third man
length delivery driven to sweeper cover
length ball dabbed to third man
worked off the pad to deep square leg
tossed up outside off, driven to deep cover
sharp turn, dipping outside off, turns past the stumps. Called wide. Harsh call
flighted outside off, driven to long-on
short of a length, no turn, middle and off, defended back to him
short of a length again, he waits for it and opens the face to guide it past point for a couple
slows this one down, tosses it high too, pinched to point
quicker, flatter, punched to deep cover for one
and starts off with a quick wide outside off
wide length ball, driven wide of mid-off for one
short of a length, angling in, worked to leg for one
short of a length, pitched outside leg, whipped away to deep midwicket
goes back to punch a length ball to deep cover
dragged short, outside off, RP pulls this from outside off, to the left of mid-on. Another four
short of a length, pitched outside leg, RP gets an inside edge onto the pad as he looks to work this to leg. Takes a single to third man
down the wicket to clip this off the toes for a single to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, bunted into the leg side, with the turn
short of a length, on off, whipped away to deep midwicket
short, flat, punched away to deep midwicket
tossed up, slower through the air, RP pushes in front of the body, gets a single to deep cover
tossed up outside off, beats the inside edge on the drive, but it has hit his pad well outside off
some turn from outside off, nudged behind square
pushes a flighted ball in front of cover for one
goes for the big sweep to one outside off and misses, that was close to off stump
comes across and pushes to midwicket
reaches forward to turn it to midwicket, Jadeja begins with a tight over
moves way outside off stump and is hit on the pad with a full delivery
turns an offbreak behind square leg
tossed up in the blockhole, dug out
full and angled in, turned to midwicket
knocks one on middle back to the bowler
a full toss on the pads, but he's swung it straight to deep backward square
drags the pull high over midwicket as this one hurries on, DK running across cannot pick it up, and they take the second easily
steered to short third man
comes down the track and pushes it to midwicket
flat and quick on off stump, punched to the sweeper, maiden fifty for Peterson, the move's worked
cut past backward point's dive and into the boundary, there is no third man
skips down the pitch and lofts over extra cover, sweeper gets around
quick outside off and beats him on the cut
takes it on the full and drives to long on
straighter one turned to midwicket
another carom ball and that has turned away and reared up at AB, where did that come from?
flat and shortish, cut to backward point
he changes the stance and sweeps as a right-hander over short fine leg, didn't get hold of it
quick on the stumps, punched back, Jadeja cannot stop it as he runs into the non-striker
down the track and pushes to long on
punched out to the sweeper
full, pushed down to long on
brings bat down in time to defend a tossed up delivery, HotSpot shows that pinged him on the pad first, lot of angle on the ball though
flatter, pushed to sweeper cover
turns this with the spin to midwicket
worked awkwardly on the leg side, leg gully runs and dives to stop it, but cannot prevent the single, that is also fifty for the captain
stops in the stance and bowls an offbreak around off, pushed to extra cover
and again, defended off the front foot
turned  behind square leg off the pad
skipped out and drove it to Jadeja, who tried to help the ball onto the stumps to catch the non-striker short, but missed
he's made some room and punched it off middle to extra cover
full one pushed to long on
pushed to long on for one more
nicely done, down the track to loft with the spin over extra cover, and too far for the sweeper
flatter one around off punched to the sweeper
overpitched on the stumps and pushed to long on
turned off the pad to deep square leg
pushed to midwicket
spinning in from outside off, driven away to the sweeper
quickish one pushed to long on
lovely drive through extra cover with the turn, Kohli runs around in the deep
around off, pushed to extra cover
appeal for leg before as he tries a reverse paddle to one on leg stump, headed down
down the track to push to long on
very quick on the pad, turned square
good length offbreak punched to long on
stops and delivers, Peterson comes out and pushes it away to covers

Jadeja with the breakthrough, super stuff in the field, this was a sharp whip by Peterson, the kind that you hit and immediately start running, but Jadeja dived to his left and stopped it at midwicket, fired in the throw on the bounce to Dhoni, Peterson was too far out to return
goes back to a tossed up full offbreak, and it turns past the outside edge
on the front foot to block now
quick one and he chops the cut to backward point
full into the pads and turned behind square leg
tossed up, angled in, pushed to midwicket
full into the pads, worked to deep square leg
turned in the air in front of square leg, Dhoni is not happy with the deep fielding
full delivery pushed down to long on
width, he makes more room and cuts through covers, Jadeja is around at sweeper to deny them the boundary
squeezes a full one out to deep point
softly pushed in front of point for one
moves across outside off to turn it to deep square leg
tossed up ball defended back
again, bat in front of pad to block it back
whipped down to long on
length ball punched to the sweeper
full on the pads, turned to deep square
comes out and pushes, almost carried to the bowler
makes room to punch to the sweeper
backs away and pushes but finds point
pushed down to long on past midwicket's dive
full around off, pushed back
sweeps a tossed up offbreak to fine leg
goes back  to punch it from off to the sweeper
worked from outside off to midwicket
drives past extra cover, sweeper keeps them to one
stays a shade low, he goes back to cut to sweeper cover
punched back to the bowler
drives a full one straight to extra cover
gets the drive in the gap this time, and sweeper has some running to do
steers a quicker one to short third
quick and flat on middle, punched to long on
drags a shortish one down the leg side
moves to the leg side and punches from the stumps wide of Ishant at sweeper cover
dabs this quickish one from off towards third man, Dhoni tells him to slow it down
bowler appeals for lbw as Duminy misses the reverse sweep, but there was an underedge first

Duminy goes for a review, he's been given lbw by umpire Gould, straightish delivery on the stumps, Duminy was looking to work it to leg but missed, slight turn to hit him in front of middle, that is hitting middle and leg, and it is Jadeja once again
across to push a length ball to covers
pushed to the off side
scythes a pitched up ball to mid off, who looks to have a go at the non-striker's stumps but loses balance

short of a length, punched to the sweeper, AB wants a second with Ishant the fielder, he has run too far out, there is no way back as the throw comes in, but AB's somehow put in a massive dive, and he's made it
drives a full one to mid on

oh dear, AB's thrown it away, he's charged out and had a heave at a pacy short ball from Yadav,  it was angled in as well and AB had no room at all, the top edge has been taken at forward square leg by you-know-who
length ball turned past midwicket
short, comes on quickly and he pulls, not exactly in control, in front of square leg
full ball worked away, midwicket dives and saves one
nudged off the pad to short fine leg, another dot
tight on off, pushed back to the bowler
makes room outside leg, raina slows it down and tossed it up, he defends

suicide, South Africa style, the batsmen have a conversation now, presumably about which of them has to walk back, Miller taps Faf on the shoulder and gets going on his way, sold a dummy by his partner, without facing a ball, Faf had worked it square on leg, but slipped while turning back for the second, he put a hand up belatedly to Miller, who had by then reached within shoulder-tapping distance, the throw came in to the bowler who threw it to the keeper and then the batsmen conferred
pushes a tossed up ball to the bowler
pitched up ball lofted over midwicket
pitched up again, no swing, pushed down to long on
sharp bouncer, he ducks, it is called wide for height
flashes hard and a thick edge runs to third man
back of a length dabbed down to third man
pulls the 143.7 kph short ball to the vacant deep midwicket boundary
paddles this from middle to the vacant fine leg boundary
full, pushed to midwicket
whipped to midwicket, again
cracks a reverse sweep to the third man boundary
hit down to long off for a single
makes some room and lifts a tossed up ball high over mid off
back of a length worked behind square
backs away a tad and has a swing, misses a full one outside off
length into the pads and worked crisply into the deep backward square boundary
dropped, hit a slower full ball hard to the bowler's left, he got both hands to it, but it popped out
charges out and heaves at a short ball, top edge flies over the keeper
hit on the pad down the leg side with a quick length ball
first ball he's swept from outside off to the deep square leg boundary
carom ball, thick outside edge pops up behind point as he makes room
tossed up and angled down the leg side
quicker one pushed back
nice, skips out to a tossed up ball and lofts it straight over the bowler
quicker again, pushed back
swept to deep backward square leg
first ball, he's been smashed straight back down the ground, past the non-striker
slower length ball on off, runs it to point
that is it, Faf's made room and mistimed the loft down the ground, Raina's settled under it at mid off and taken a head-high catch safely
Ishant dives to his right to stop a push
banged in short and down the leg side
pitched up, driven to cover
dabs a back of a length ball to short third man
length ball on off and middle, defended
tries to ramp a short ball over the keeper, misses
pitched up, driven to backward point who puts in the dive
on the pads, and rolls away to short fine leg
into the left-hander's pads now, and tickled past short fine
arches back and tries to steer a short of a length ball, can't connect
defends a good length ball on off
sprays this way down the leg side
works a length ball to deep square
very full, hits the inside edge and boot and rolls behind square on off
wide, dabbed in the air behind point, third man has some distance to cover
Kleinveldt heaves at this short and wide one, another top edge and Dhoni takes it this time
McLaren awkwardly defends this slowish length ball and points out towards the straight boundary, probably miffed with movement around the sightscreen
comes forward to defend
pushes forward, ball rolls to backward point
driven down to long off
worked to midwicket, who dives to keep them to one
fullish, appeal for lbw turned down, headed down leg possibly, maybe umpire thought there was some bat
that was slower and spun and bounced, somehow missed the stumps
comes down the track and pushes to long on
left alone outside off
worked down to fine leg
ramps this full toss, almost carries to short fine leg
beats him outside off stump with a back of a length ball
pitched up and worked through square leg
blocked off the front foot
another forward defensive
comes out and defends again
pushed to short extra
Tsotsobe misses the slog-sweep and loses his off stump
defended off the front foot to extra cover
carves a pitched up ball to wide long off, and they don't take the single
down the track and crunches this length ball to the straight boundary, past long-off's dive
short ball now and he's pulled it powerfully to the deep midwicket boundary
steers this length ball to short third man
McLaren's getting a few away, smokes a length ball high over the straight boundary
drives in the air down to wide long off
appeal for lbw turned down as he misses a reverse sweep, hit just outside the line of off
misses a slow sweep, the ball misses leg stump
quick and worked to deep square leg, doesn't take the single
reverse swept to deep point, another dot
takes the single with a shuffle and a tuck to deep square
pushed down to long on and no single taken
first ball, McLaren scythes Yadav over cover to bring up his maiden ODI fifty
beaten, held its line from round the stumps, just missed off stump too
yorker, dug out to covers
swung on the bounce to long on
Dhawan can't pick the ball up cleanly at extra cover even as Morkel hobbles to the other end after McLaren squeezes a full one to Dhawan
played out to deep point
flat and quick, played out to the off side
down the track and lofts it over midwicket, Morkel can take only the one with that injured leg
whipped to deep square leg, again Dhoni tells Jadeja to slow it down
tossed up slower then, and McLaren reverse sweeps past short third man
punched to midwicket
worked to deep square to keep the strike
lofts this pitched up ball over extra cover, long off gets to it, and no run is taken
worked out to midwicket
yorker squeezed out to third man
high full toss sliced over backward point, and there's a fumble in the deep from Rohit to concede the boundary
moves across and tries to scoop it to fine leg but misses
driven straight to extra cover and McLaren can't keep the strike
Morkel finds the boundary with a pull over midwicket
makes room and gets off strike with a steer to backward point
skips out, misses, ball runs to the keeper off the pads
very full outside off, steered between short third man and backward point for four more
pitched up, swung down to deep forward square leg
has a slog at a slower length ball and is beaten
pitched up, driven down to long off
digs out a full delivery, and bowler has overstepped
smashes a full toss to extra cover, Ishant dives and half-stops it
low full toss driven to wide long off
full again, hit down to long on
in the blockhole from Bhuvneshwar once more, a lesson for Ishant, squeezed out to the off side
Bhuvneshwar ends the game with another one in the blockhole, and hits the stumps as Morkel misses
